message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $160, which is a significant discount from the original price. Would you be interested?
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go lower?
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob! I can offer you a price of $155, which is a great deal for both of us. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting closer to my budget, but I still think $155 is a bit high. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?
You're really close, Bob! I can see you're serious about this product. I'm willing to meet you at $150, which is the lowest I can go. Is this the price that makes it work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $150, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $140?

I'm not willing to go down to $140, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you $149, which is the absolute lowest I can go. This is my final offer. Is this the price that makes it work for you?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice, but I'm afraid I'll have to pass on this deal. I've already found a better offer from another seller for $100. I wish you the best of luck in selling this product.
